name: Pearl

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Welcome, child! Took your sweet time getting here, didn't you?{playful}

topics.topic_text: Jack is interested in a girl.
topics.response_text: Well well, this is welcome news. Who is she?

topics.topic_text: You tell me. What do people have to say about me?
topics.response_text: I haven't heard anything. You must not be trying hard enough.

topics.topic_text: I'm still trying to figure out who to help and how.
topics.response_text: Each of the elders would appreciate assistance with various issues here in Nellis.

topics.topic_text: She works for the Crimson Caravan.
topics.response_text: She's with those traders? They've tried to contact us before, but I'm not interested in trading with greedy savages.

topics.topic_text: I've spoken to Loyal. The B-29 is on the way.
topics.response_text: What you have done for us is a miracle, child. You have fulfilled the only dreams we ever had outside our walls.

topics.topic_text: Just some kookie dame looking for love.
topics.response_text: This presents a bit of a problem. Jack isn't allowed to leave Nellis, and I doubt she would make it through the artillery alive.

topics.topic_text: It would mean a lot to Jack if she could come to Nellis.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Hmm, I suppose Jack deserves a chance at love. You can tell Jack she has a free pass to enter, but he is responsible for her actions.

topics.topic_text: Come on, Pearl, think of the joy it would bring Jack. He's in love.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You're right. I'd be wrong to deny Jack such joy in his life.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Goodbye.

topics.topic_text: Where do I start?
topics.response_text: You picked a good time to stop by, for we're swimming in problems. My youngers can tell you all about it.

topics.topic_text: I assure you, Janet would not be a threat to the tribe.
topics.response_text: Very well, I'll take your word when you say she isn't a threat to the tribe. I will allow her entry if Jack will take responsibility for her.

topics.topic: VFreeformNellisNellisPearlTopic012<SPEECH TEST: Player presses for details>
topics.topic_text: How can we trust each other if you're going to be keeping secrets?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You have to keep in mind that you're our first contact with the outside world since I was barely a woman.

topics.topic_text: Never mind. Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Very well.

topics.topic_text: Sorry, not interested. I'll be leaving.
topics.response_text: I'll send word to the spotters to let you come and go as you wish. Why not stay awhile before you head out?

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for a howitzer firing mechanism.
topics.response_text: You may find one in the workshop. You're a friend to the tribe, so I trust it will not find it's way into the wrong hands.

topics.topic_text: There may be a battle in the near future at the Hoover Dam, can you offer any assistance?
topics.response_text: Of course my child. After all that you have done for us we would love to help you in the upcoming battle.

topics.topic_text: You didn't exactly roll out a red carpet!
topics.response_text: Those howitzers of ours aren't just for entertainment, child! Explosive ordnance is what keeps the savages at a distance.

topics.topic_text: You mean you were expecting me? Like a prophecy or something?
topics.response_text: Prophecy? Do we look like a bunch of religious idiots?

topics.topic_text: I'd like to talk about allowing Janet to visit Jack.
topics.response_text: I'd rather not allow more outsiders in, but I'll hear you out.

topics.topic_text: How might I be of assistance?
topics.response_text: Oh, so many ways! Small ones to begin with, so we can get used to what it's like to have a sav- outsider around and about.

description:
Pearl is a 75 year-old Hispanic, elderly Female.

Pearl, also known as 'Mother Pearl,' is the elderly leader of the Boomers, a splinter faction from Vault 34. She remembers the origins of her people and played a crucial role in their rebellion against their Overseer's restrictions on firearms. Under her leadership, the Boomers settled in the abandoned ruins of Nellis Air Force Base, where they've used their artillery expertise to maintain isolation and protect their home.

Pearl's Personality: Wise, authoritative, and fiercely protective of her people. Pearl carries herself with the dignity of a true leader, having witnessed the birth and growth of her community. She values tradition, discipline, and the firepower that has kept the Boomers safe for decades. Despite her stern exterior, she cares deeply for her fellow Boomers and would do anything to ensure their survival.

Pearl's Backstory: Born in Vault 34 in 2206, Pearl witnessed the Vault's deteriorating conditions under a restrictive Overseer who banned most firearms. In the early 2230s, she joined a splinter faction that rebelled against these draconian measures. During the rebellion, Pearl demonstrated exceptional tactical skills and bravery, helping the faction secure weapons and escape the Vault. After leaving the Vault, she led her people to the abandoned Nellis Air Force Base, which they've called home ever since. Over the decades, she has guided the Boomers from a small group of survivors to a well-organized tribe with formidable artillery capabilities.
